item.title: 📡Excited for @bluedotfestival 21-24 July 📡it’s our onlyUK festival show this summer 📡line up is ✔️✔️ & ticking off lifelong ambition to play in vicinity of Queen @bjork 🙇🏻‍♀️ 📡Here we are back in goodoledays/2017 looking all young(er) during my short lived Fanta hair phase🍊
item.dc:creator: @AnnaHMeredith
item.description:
📡Excited for @bluedotfestival 21-24 July
📡it’s our onlyUK festival show this summer
📡line up is ✔️✔️ & ticking off lifelong ambition to play in vicinity of Queen @bjork 🙇🏻‍♀️
📡Here we are back in goodoledays/2017 looking all young(er) during my short lived Fanta hair phase🍊

item.title:
RT by @AnnaHMeredith: A chance to hear our performance of @AnnaHMeredith 's 'Handsfree' by @tomcoult on @BBCRadio3's New Music Show, broadcast on Saturday presented by @tomservice
We're so excited to perform this incredible piece on July 3rd at @southbankcentre!! 🙌🙌
https://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/m00188mp
item.dc:creator: @NYO_GB
item.description:

item.title: RT by @AnnaHMeredith: Tonight @BrittenPears hear Anna Meredith's Camberwell Green, part of the programme 8 Hands, which explores piano music made from the most minimal of materials, feat. @clare_pianist @graham_fitkin Ruth Wall and @kathystott. 🎟️ http://ow.ly/6gvG50JvQRI
item.dc:creator: @Fabercomposers
item.description: Tonight @BrittenPears hear Anna Meredith's Camberwell Green, part of the programme 8 Hands, which explores piano music made from the most minimal of materials, feat. @clare_pianist @graham_fitkin Ruth Wall and @kathystott. 🎟️ ow.ly/6gvG50JvQRI

item.title:
RT by @AnnaHMeredith: 🎫 A limited number of extra tickets have been released for SURGE 🌊 - an exciting multidimensional experience.
Featuring music by Anna Meredith, spoken word poetry by Vanessa Kisuule, and a live performance by The PappyShow.
Book your free tickets: http://bit.ly/3Mzx9hW
item.dc:creator: @Sage_Gateshead
item.description:
🎫 A limited number of extra tickets have been released for SURGE 🌊 - an exciting multidimensional experience.

item.title: We play >@NNFest on Saturday! Norwich-environs dwellers! Come along! P.S FIBS is sold out! looking into repress but reckon it’ll be“a while” for restock but I have liderally got 2 left which I’ll bring along Sat for The Annual Norfolk-Dwellers-Fight-To-The-Death-Over-Limited-Vinyl
item.dc:creator: @AnnaHMeredith
item.description:
We play @NNFest on Saturday! Norwich-environs dwellers! Come along!
P.S FIBS is sold out! looking into repress but reckon it’ll be“a while” for restock
but I have liderally got 2 left which I’ll bring along Sat for The Annual Norfolk-Dwellers-Fight-To-The-Death-Over-Limited-Vinyl

item.title: RT by @AnnaHMeredith: Experience SURGE, a brand new immersive performance by @WeAreMegaverse at @Sage_Gateshead on 4 & 5 June – featuring music by Anna Meredith, dance, poetry & VR to bring to life our lost connection with water. Book your free tickets https://bit.ly/3Mzx9hW
item.dc:creator: @the_Crack
item.description: Experience SURGE, a brand new immersive performance by @WeAreMegaverse at @Sage_Gateshead on 4 & 5 June – featuring music by Anna Meredith, dance, poetry & VR to bring to life our lost connection with water. Book your free tickets bit.ly/3Mzx9hW

item.title: R to @AnnaHMeredith: In Dresden for the 1st time! We’re playing @dresdenfestival TONIGHT!!! It’s going to be one of our last EU gigs “for a while” 😢😢😢 German pals! COME ALONG!!!
item.dc:creator: @AnnaHMeredith
item.description:
In Dresden for the 1st time!
We’re playing @dresdenfestival TONIGHT!!!
It’s going to be one of our last EU gigs “for a while” 😢😢😢
German pals! COME ALONG!!!

item.title:
R to @AnnaHMeredith: 🇩🇪 FRIDAY! 13th MAY! 20:00 🫧our first time in Dresden as part of the excellent @dresdenfestival
https://www.musikfestspiele.com/en/program-tickets/#e1124
Only a few more chances to hear us live this year before I get back to ✍️🎶 Come along!

item.title:
Can’t wait to head Brussels & Dresden this week for a couple of gigs!
🇧🇪WEDNESDAY! 11th MAY! 20:00 🫧delighted to be returning to the beautiful @Botanique Playing in the Grand Salon w/ wonderful Shoko Igarashi playing before us!
https://shop.botanique.be/widgets/botanique/addtickets?event=889813193882&l=en#!/addtickets

item.title: R to @AnnaHMeredith: 🪩finally my beautiful band @maddiecutter @samwilson323 @ThomasKelly14 @jacktheguitar and our Manager Rachey, I’m a bit gushed out but what remaining moisture can be wrung out of this crispy old flannel is all for you beauties 💛🧽
item.dc:creator: @AnnaHMeredith
item.description: 🪩finally my beautiful band @maddiecutter @samwilson323 @ThomasKelly14 @jacktheguitar and our Manager Rachey, I’m a bit gushed out but what remaining moisture can be wrung out of this crispy old flannel is all for you beauties 💛🧽

item.title: 🪩legend Si Hendry for making us all sound so amazing. So many people said how brilliant the sound was which is no mean feat with 100 odd channels pumping in about 2000 notes a second
item.dc:creator: @AnnaHMeredith
item.description: 🪩legend Si Hendry for making us all sound so amazing. So many people said how brilliant the sound was which is no mean feat with 100 odd channels pumping in about 2000 notes a second

item.title: R to @AnnaHMeredith: 🪩 amazing @auclairmusic & @C_Smickersgill for kicking the night off in the perfect way. Both of your sets were pure FL🔥MES & grateful to u both for being there 🪩boss @ewanjonesmorris who made the most perfect, clever and musical visuals I wanted to side eye throughout the set
item.dc:creator: @AnnaHMeredith
item.description:
🪩 amazing @auclairmusic & @C_Smickersgill for kicking the night off in the perfect way. Both of your sets were pure FL🔥MES & grateful to u both for being there
🪩boss @ewanjonesmorris who made the most perfect, clever and musical visuals I wanted to side eye throughout the set

item.title: R to @AnnaHMeredith: 🪩 @barbicancentre for making the whole shebang happen (esp Chris, Chris, Lucy & their teams) even assembling our post show rollerdisco (huge bows to DJ legends @nabihahiqbal & @MaxTundra who soundtracked our undignified stumbles & my inevitable ass plant PERFECTLY….) 🛼🛼
item.dc:creator: @AnnaHMeredith
item.description: 🪩 @barbicancentre for making the whole shebang happen (esp Chris, Chris, Lucy & their teams) even assembling our post show rollerdisco (huge bows to DJ legends @nabihahiqbal & @MaxTundra who soundtracked our undignified stumbles & my inevitable ass plant PERFECTLY….) 🛼🛼

item.title: R to @AnnaHMeredith: Huge❤️‍🔥to: 🪩@LCOrchestra & @robertamesmusic who played their arses off—a total joy to share a stage w/you 🪩@robertamesmusic @Ben_Corrigan & JJ&Sasha for incredible orchestrations & making FIBS even fibbier & @samwilson323 who painstakingly tuned 59x🍷 w/ a turkey baster 4Unfurl
item.dc:creator: @AnnaHMeredith
item.description:
Huge❤️‍🔥to:
🪩@LCOrchestra & @robertamesmusic who played their arses off—a total joy to share a stage w/you
🪩@robertamesmusic @Ben_Corrigan & JJ&Sasha for incredible orchestrations & making FIBS even fibbier & @samwilson323 who painstakingly tuned 59x🍷 w/ a turkey baster 4Unfurl

item.title: Nearly recovered fr a pretty mahoosive wknd @BarbicanCentre My 🧦🧦 were well & truly blown off! felt amazing & so joyful to celebrate life & noise & energy & calm & daftness & seriousness with so many people. Thank you all so much for coming, gush🧵cont:⬇️(📸@downatthefront )
item.dc:creator: @AnnaHMeredith
